creditline: The James S. Bell Memorial Fund
description: a pair of exceptionally rare, unusually large sized William and Mary candlesticks; plain octagonal bases, with large bold gadroon above, fluted columns with gadroon at the base, the upper part of the columns surmounted with leaves, removable bobeche
markings:
Mark

Each fully marked on underside of base.  The nozzles unmarked.
title: Candlestick, one of a pair
